headline.main: Dirty Tenant-Houses--The Remedy--Mr. Folsom Charges the Proposal to Emprison Terrnis upon the Legislative Committee.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Daily Times: It will be admitted that it is the duty of the occupants of a house to kep it clean, and therefore, landlords usually prescribe rules to all the tenants of such houses, by which, if observed, the premises will be kept clean and in good order; and there would be a great deal less complaint if these rules were enforced.
